Title: Relates to behavioral health parity
Summary: Relates to behavioral health parity; requires facilities to perform daily clinical review of a patient and consult periodically with the insurer regarding the patient's progress, course of treatment, and discharge plan; requires insurers to actively participate in facility-initiated periodic consultations prior to the patient's discharge; makes related provisions (Part A); provides that no policy shall require prior authorization for an initial or renewal prescription for drugs for the detoxification or maintenance of a substance use disorder; makes related provisions (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to providing behavioral health parity (Part A); and to amend the insurance law, in relation to the authorization for certain drugs for the detoxification or maintenance of a substance use disorder (Part B)
